fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 71.15 points or 0.38% to settle at 18,563.40. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.22% to 11.12. Kotak Mahindra Bank, Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL) and Indian Energy Exchange (IEX) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
